refnamediv.refpurpose: GailTextUtil is a utility class which can be used to implement some of the AtkText functions for accessible objects which implement AtkText.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
GailTextUtil is a utility class which can be used to implement the AtkText functions which get text for accessible objects which implement AtkText.
In GAIL it is used by the accsesible objects for GnomeCanvasText, GtkEntry, GtkLabel, GtkCellRendererText and GtkTextview.

refsect2.para: The GailTextCell structure should not be accessed directly.

refsect2.title: gail_text_util_get_text ()
refsect2.programlisting: gchar* gail_text_util_get_text (GailTextUtil *textutil, gpointer layout, GailOffsetType function, AtkTextBoundary boundary_type, gint offset, gint *start_offset, gint *end_offset);
refsect2.para: This function gets the requested substring from the text in the GtkTextUtil. The layout is used only for getting the text on a line. The value is NULL for a GtkTextView which is not wrapped, is a GtkTextView for a GtkTextView which is wrapped and is a PangoLayout otherwise.
